actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend from 10 years to 15 years the period in which veterans' educational assistance may be used.

summary.text: Extends from ten to 15 years the delimiting period in which a veteran's educational assistance must be used; except that if at the close of such 15-year period any eligible veteran is pursuing a program of education, assistance shall continue until such veteran completes or ceases to pursue it.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend from 10 years to 15 years the period in which veterans' educational assistance may be used.
